results.title: Geranylgeranyl transferase regulates streptococcal M1 protein-induced CXC chemokine formation and neutrophil recruitment in the lung.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Shock_Septic @DISEASE_MESH:D012772 @@@Streptococcal toxic shock syndrome@@@ is most frequently associated with @SPECIES_1314 @@@Streptococcus pyogenes@@@ of the M1 serotype. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ protects against M1 protein-induced @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000208 @@@acute@@@ @DISEASE_Lung_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung damage@@@, although downstream mechanisms remain elusive.

citations.NLM: Zhang S, Rahman M, Jeppsson B, Herwald H, Thorlacius H. Geranylgeranyl transferase regulates streptococcal M1 protein-induced CXC chemokine formation and neutrophil recruitment in the lung. Shock. 2013 Mar;39(3):293-8. PMID: 23364431
